name: Mr Citrouille
text: Hey you ! Yes you ! Put me on your head.

name: Mr Citrouille
text: Do you see the the hill in front on you ? Go and climb it.

name: Mr Citrouille
text: Oh no step-sis you are stuck ! try to avoid the tree. Click on "Enter"

name: Mr Citrouille
text: GG !! You completed the tutorial ! Now go explore this mysterios world !
